title: Fixed-width font with Greek language characters and special a
author: eyeQ

comments.content:
Γειά σου Ειρήνη,

it must be **Whitney (Medium)** by Hoefler & Co:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/whitney/overview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170157/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/whitney/overview/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/whitney/overview/")

Φοίβος (από Αθήνα)
